About Me

I'm Paul Buschmann, a passionate Software Developer, currently studying Computer Science, living in Vienna, Austria.

I got into programming out of curiosity at the age of 18. I wanted to figure out what there is that keeps the games running which I play.

After high school, I studied at FH Salzburg with a major in Game Development. It was there when I made my first experiences with C, C++ and C#. Since then I learned my way around engines like Unity3D and Unreal Engine 4.

Lately I took an interest in Web Development and learned JavaScript. Where I work with node.js and React

When I am not behind my screen, I also like cooking, talking korean to my beautiful girlfriend and traveling.
